name: Overgrowth (itch) (Banana Hammer)
description:
The Earth has been ravaged by humans and is now devoid of practically any life.

Assume the role of the last surviving tree and restore nature by destroying the humans and their cities with your seeds.

Controls:

Move- WASD

Shoot - LMB

Grass Seed - 1

Tree Seed - 2

Instructions:

Shoot enemies and towns with your seeds until none remain.

Grass Seed - Spawns grass where enemy is destroyed. Grass slows enemies and player.

Tree Seed - Slower fire rate, higher damage. Spawns tree where enemy is destroyed. Trees block movement and projectiles.
